SELECT DISTINCT SI_MENJOU.SI_MENJOU_ID ,
SI_MENJOU.MS_SENIN_ID , SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID , SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID ,
SI_MENJOU.NO , SI_MENJOU.KIGEN , SI_MENJOU.SHUTOKU_DATE , SI_MENJOU.CHOUHYOU_FLAG ,
SI_MENJOU.DELETE_FLAG, SI_MENJOU.SEND_FLAG, SI_MENJOU.VESSEL_ID, SI_MENJOU.DATA_NO, SI_MENJOU.USER_KEY, SI_MENJOU.RENEW_DATE, SI_MENJOU.RENEW_USER_ID, SI_MENJOU.TS,
MS_SI_MENJOU.SHOW_ORDER, MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.SHOW_ORDER
FROM SI_MENJOU
JOIN MS_SI_MENJOU ON MS_SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID = SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_ID LEFT JOIN MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND ON MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID = SI_MENJOU.MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID
WHERE SI_MENJOU.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO SI_MENJOU( SI_MENJOU_ID ,
MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_MENJOU_ID , MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID ,
NO , KIGEN , SHUTOKU_DATE , CHOUHYOU_FLAG ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_MENJOU_ID ,
:MS_SENIN_ID , :MS_SI_MENJOU_ID , :MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID ,
:NO , :KIGEN , :SHUTOKU_DATE , :CHOUHYOU_FLAG ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_MENJOU SET MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID , MS_SI_MENJOU_ID = :MS_SI_MENJOU_ID , MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID = :MS_SI_MENJOU_KIND_ID ,
NO = :NO , KIGEN = :KIGEN , SHUTOKU_DATE = :SHUTOKU_DATE , CHOUHYOU_FLAG = :CHOUHYOU_FLAG ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_MENJOU_ID = :SI_MENJOU_ID
